Here are some mini-exercises to practice your new Python skills. Exercises are in Python 2, but since they’re all browser-based you should be able to follow along regardless of what version of Python you use locally.

Coding Bat

These exercises have been curated by the Boston Python Workshop as a good introduction. Create an account & log in to track your progress and access additional exercises.

Codecademy This is part of Codecademy’s Intro to Python class. Again, you can create an account to track your progress and access additional lessons.
